error.message: Call to deprecated method getMock() of class Drupal\KernelTests\KernelTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Tests\PhpunitCompatibilityTrait::createMock() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to extra_field.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
